item.title: Rensselyrics Spring Auditions
item.description: Date: Tuesday, January 27, 2026 8:00 PM - 10:30 PM - Join the Rensselyrics for our Spring 2026 auditions! The process is easy- just prepare a verse and a chorus of any song you feel confident in, and that you feel best shows off your voice. item.title: CEE Seminar Series - Dr. Takatoshi Kiriyama Senior Researcher and Manager Geotechnical & Foundation Group – Shimizu Corporation
item.description: Date: Wednesday, January 28, 2026 1:00 PM - 2:00 PM - “Physical and numerical modeling of geomaterial in practical construction”. Understanding deformation and failure of geomaterials under foundation loading remains a key challenge in geotechnical engineering. This seminar aims to bridge the gap between physical observations and numerical predictions from a practical engineering viewpoint by presenting geomaterial and foundation related research using both approaches.

item.title: Cloud Control: Interactive Networks for Audio-Visual Performance with Eric Souther
item.description: This three-hour workshop in West Hall 211 will introduce the node-based programming environment TouchDesigner for creating real-time audiovisuals. The session will begin with a brief introduction to TouchDesigner’s interface and core concepts, followed by a demonstration of my own work created with the platform. Participants will then learn hands-on techniques for mapping data and creating interactive controls for live performance, with a focus on particle systems manipulation. Join 1/28 at 5pm.
